io-error.name: IO Error
io-error.message: The data source returned an IO Error of type {error_type}

http-error.name: HTTP Error
http-error.message: The data source returned an HTTP error with a status code of {status_code}

source-error.name: Source Error
source-error.message: The data source has not supported or has inconsistent contents; no tabular data can be extracted

scheme-error.name: Scheme Error
scheme-error.message: The data source is in an unknown scheme; no tabular data can be extracted

format-error.name: Format Error
format-error.message: The data source is in an unknown format; no tabular data can be extracted

encoding-error.name: Encoding Error
encoding-error.message: The data source could not be successfully decoded with {encoding} encoding

duplicate-header.name: Duplicate Header
duplicate-header.message: Header in column {column_number} is duplicated to header in column(s) {column_numbers}

extra-value.name: Extra Value
extra-value.message: Row {row_number} has an extra value in column {column_number}

missing-value.name: Missing Value
missing-value.message: Row {row_number} has a missing value in column {column_number}

non-matching-header.name: Non-Matching Header
non-matching-header.message: Header in column {column_number} doesn't match field name {field_name}

extra-header.name: Extra Header
extra-header.message: There is an extra header in column {column_number}

missing-header.name: Missing Header
missing-header.message: There is a missing header in column {column_number}

required-constraint.name: Required Constraint
required-constraint.message: Column {column_number} is a required field, but row {row_number} has no value

pattern-constraint.name: Pattern Constraint
pattern-constraint.message: The value {value} in row {row_number} and column {column_number} does not conform to the pattern constraint of {constraint}

non-castable-value.name: Non-Castable Value
non-castable-value.message: Row {row_number} has non castable value {value} in column {column_number} (type: {field_type}, format: {field_format})

unique-constraint.name: Unique Constraint
unique-constraint.message: Rows {row_numbers} has unique constraint violation in column {column_number}

enumerable-constraint.name: Enumerable Constraint
enumerable-constraint.message: The value {value} in row {row_number} and column {column_number} does not conform to the given enumeration: {constraint}

minimum-constraint.name: Minimum Constraint
minimum-constraint.message: The value {value} in row {row_number} and column {column_number} does not conform to the minimum constraint of {constraint}

maximum-constraint.name: Maximum Constraint
maximum-constraint.message: The value {value} in row {row_number} and column {column_number} does not conform to the maximum constraint of {constraint}

minimum-length-constraint.name: Minimum Length Constraint
minimum-length-constraint.message: The value {value} in row {row_number} and column {column_number} does not conform to the minimum length constraint of {constraint}

maximum-length-constraint.name: Maximum Length Constraint
maximum-length-constraint.message: The value {value} in row {row_number} and column {column_number} does not conform to the maximum length constraint of {constraint}
